Description: Sales software to accelerate your sales lead management.
Name: Velocify

Methods.Name: Get New Lead IDs
Methods.Description: Get IDs of new leads created after the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get New Leads
Methods.Description: Get new leads created after the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Lead
Methods.Description: Get a lead by its ID.

Methods.Name: Get Leads By Email
Methods.Description: Get the lead(s) for a given email.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Leads
Methods.Description: Get new leads updated after the last run time.

Methods.Name: Create Lead
Methods.Description: Create a new lead entity. Custom fields must be added with Field Location values of 'soapenv:Envelope.Field_ID_*'  where '*' is the Field ID. Retrieve field IDs from the List Fields method.

Methods.Name: List Fields
Methods.Description: Get a list of the available fields that a lead can have. (For use with the 'Create Lead' method)

Methods.Name: List Campaigns
Methods.Description: Get a list of all campaigns.
